page.title: 02MY DAY (ADULT) LIVERTON.
page.content: My name is{Gerald Martin.}I am divorced and am bringing up 2 of my 3 children on my own. I get up at 6.30am and exercise my 2 dogs in the nearby fields . I return home at 7.00am and wake my children and get our breakfast. Once the children are ready for school i leave the house and walk to work . I work as a {carpenter and {joiner}at{Seale Hayne Agricultural {College.}I have a very varied and enjoyable job maintaining the wooden buildings and furniture. I work from 8.00am untill 1.00pm and from 1.30pm until 4.30pm. The children are already home when I arrive and we make and have tea. The children change into their play clothes and I wash the breakfast,lunch and tea things; dry and clear away.Some days we also do washing,ironing and shopping.So my days are long,varied,full and happy.
